Title: Those Who Love Me Can Take the Train
Writer: Danièle Thompson (scenario), Patrice Chéreau (scenario), Pierre Trividic (scenario), Danièle Thompson (original idea)
Actors: Pascal Greggory, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi, Charles Berling, Jean-Louis Trintignant
Plot: Friends of a recently deceased minor painter Jean-Baptiste take a train in Paris for Limoges, where he wished to be buried, and all the people on the train have their problems.
